snippet: When Kristina Mladenovic was asked if she was shaking in her designer boots at the prospect of facing "the monument of women's tennis" that is Serena Williams, the fearless Frenchwoman looked astonished....
lead_paragraph: When Kristina Mladenovic was asked if she was shaking in her designer boots at the prospect of facing "the monument of women's tennis" that is Serena Williams, the fearless Frenchwoman looked astonished.

headline.print_headline: Fearless Mladenovic Gets Serena Hot and Bothered
headline.main: Fearless Mladenovic Gets Serena Hot and Bothered
